languages.text: {n}Запись похожа на религиозную проповедь безумца, поклоняющегося {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Хаосу{/g}. В логе, явно сделанном с чужих слов, упоминается "сердце, извергающее благость" и "колыбель, укачивающая дитя Истины".{/n}

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Что-нибудь про то, что происходит на форж харте

languages.text: {n}This record looks like a sermon of some mad {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} worshipper. The log, clearly written from someone else's words, mentions "the heart that exudes virtue" and "the cradle that rocks the child of Truth."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Запись похожа на религиозную проповедь безумца, поклоняющегося {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Хаосу{/g}. В логе, явно сделанном с чужих слов, упоминается "сердце, извергающее благость" и "колыбель, укачивающая дитя Истины".{/n}

{n}This record looks like a sermon of some mad {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} worshipper. The log, clearly written from someone else's words, mentions "the heart that exudes virtue" and "the cradle that rocks the child of Truth."{/n}

languages.text: {n}这段记录看起来像是某个疯狂的{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌{/g}崇拜者的布道。很显然，这些话是根据别人的话写出来的，其中提到了“散发美德的心灵”与“容纳真理之子的摇篮”。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This record looks like a sermon of some mad {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} worshipper. The log, clearly written from someone else's words, mentions "the heart that exudes virtue" and "the cradle that rocks the child of Truth."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这段记录看起来像是某个疯狂的{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌{/g}崇拜者的布道。很显然，这些话是根据别人的话写出来的，其中提到了“散发美德的心灵”与“容纳真理之子的摇篮”。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Este registro parece un sermón de algún loco adorador del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Caos{/g}. El acta, claramente escrita por otra persona, menciona un tal «corazón que rebosa virtud» y una «cuna que mece al hijo de la Verdad».{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This record looks like a sermon of some mad {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} worshipper. The log, clearly written from someone else's words, mentions "the heart that exudes virtue" and "the cradle that rocks the child of Truth."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Este registro parece un sermón de algún loco adorador del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Caos{/g}. El acta, claramente escrita por otra persona, menciona un tal «corazón que rebosa virtud» y una «cuna que mece al hijo de la Verdad».{/n}

languages.text: {n}この記録はまるで、狂った{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌{/g}崇拝者による説教のようだ。ログには明らかに誰かが書いた言葉で「徳が溢れ出る心」やら「真実の子が眠るゆりかご」やらの記述がある。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This record looks like a sermon of some mad {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} worshipper. The log, clearly written from someone else's words, mentions "the heart that exudes virtue" and "the cradle that rocks the child of Truth."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}この記録はまるで、狂った{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌{/g}崇拝者による説教のようだ。ログには明らかに誰かが書いた言葉で「徳が溢れ出る心」やら「真実の子が眠るゆりかご」やらの記述がある。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Diese Aufzeichnung sieht aus wie eine Predigt eines wahnsinnigen {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g}-Anbeters. Das Log, eindeutig die Worte eines anderen, erwähnt "das Herz, das Tugend verströmt", und "die Wiege mit dem Kind der Wahrheit".{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This record looks like a sermon of some mad {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} worshipper. The log, clearly written from someone else's words, mentions "the heart that exudes virtue" and "the cradle that rocks the child of Truth."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Diese Aufzeichnung sieht aus wie eine Predigt eines wahnsinnigen {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g}-Anbeters. Das Log, eindeutig die Worte eines anderen, erwähnt "das Herz, das Tugend verströmt", und "die Wiege mit dem Kind der Wahrheit".{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cette archive ressemble au sermon d'un adorateur fou du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g}. Le journal, manifestement rédigé à partir de déclarations d'autrui, mentionne « le cœur qui irradie la vertu » et « le couffin qui berce l'enfant de la Vérité ».{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}This record looks like a sermon of some mad {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g} worshipper. The log, clearly written from someone else's words, mentions "the heart that exudes virtue" and "the cradle that rocks the child of Truth."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cette archive ressemble au sermon d'un adorateur fou du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Chaos{/g}. Le journal, manifestement rédigé à partir de déclarations d'autrui, mentionne « le cœur qui irradie la vertu » et « le couffin qui berce l'enfant de la Vérité ».{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bu veri kaydı, {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Kaos'a{/g} tapan bir delinin vaazına benziyor. Besbelli başkasının sözlerinden alınmış kayıt, "erdem taşan kalp" ile "Hakikat'in çocuğunu sallayan beşik" ile ilgili.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bu veri kaydı, {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Kaos{/g}'a tapan bir delinin vaazına benziyor. Besbelli başkasının sözlerinden alınmış kayıt, "erdem taşan kalp" ile "Hakikat'in çocuğunu sallayan beşik"ten bahsediyor.{/n}
